languages.text: "Обскураториа — полный запрет на священное служение в пределах комплекса. Любые священные технические процедуры отложены до прекращения запрета. Режим Обскураториа объявляют, когда храм скомпрометирован подозрением на наличие порчи, перед боем, в случае масштабных критических аварий..."

"An Obscuratoria is a complete ban on holy ministry within the compound. Any and all sacred maintenance procedures are deferred until after the ban is lifted. An Obscuratoria is declared when a temple has been compromised by suspected corruption, before a battle, or in the event of a major critical incident..."
languages.original_text: "Обскураториа — полный запрет на священное служение в пределах комплекса. Любые священные технические процедуры отложены до прекращения запрета. Режим Обскураториа объявляют, когда храм скомпрометирован подозрением на наличие порчи, перед боем, в случае масштабных критических аварий..."

traits.locale_text: "An Obscuratoria is a complete ban on holy ministry within the compound. Any and all sacred maintenance procedures are deferred until after the ban is lifted. An Obscuratoria is declared when a temple has been compromised by suspected corruption, before a battle, or in the event of a major critical accident..."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

An Obscuratoria is declared when a temple has been compromised by suspected corruption, before a battle, or in the event of a major critical incident..."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「オブスキュラでは、船内で聖職者が活動することは全面的に禁止となります。あらゆる神聖なメンテナンス手順は禁止令が解かれるまで延期されるのです。オブスキュラが宣言される事態というのは、神殿に腐敗の疑いがあるとき、戦闘の前、あるいは致命的な重大事故が発生した場合…」
languages.original_text: "An Obscuratoria is a complete ban on holy ministry within the compound. Any and all sacred maintenance procedures are deferred until after the ban is lifted. An Obscuratoria is declared when a temple has been compromised by suspected corruption, before a battle, or in the event of a major critical incident..."

traits.locale_text: 「オブスキュラでは、船内で聖職者が活動することは全面的に禁止となります。あらゆる神聖なメンテナンス手順は禁止令が解かれるまで延期されるのです。オブスキュラが宣言される事態というのは、神殿に腐敗の疑いがあるとき、戦闘の前、あるいは致命的な重大事故が発生した場合…」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “隐匿禁令指的是完全禁止房间内神圣事务的禁令，任何神圣维护程序都需要推迟到禁令解除之后。隐匿禁令宣布的时机，通常是当神庙涉嫌腐化，或者战斗即将爆发，或是发生重大变故……”
languages.original_text: "An Obscuratoria is a complete ban on holy ministry within the compound. Any and all sacred maintenance procedures are deferred until after the ban is lifted. An Obscuratoria is declared when a temple has been compromised by suspected corruption, before a battle, or in the event of a major critical incident..."

traits.locale_text: “隐匿禁令指的是完全禁止房间内神圣事务的禁令，任何神圣维护程序都需要推迟到禁令解除之后。隐匿禁令宣布的时机，通常是当神庙涉嫌腐化，或者战斗即将爆发，或是发生重大事故……”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Le mode Obscuratoria bannit tout membre du ministère sacré dans l'enceinte du complexe. Les procédures de maintenance sacrées sont alors reportées jusqu'à ce que l'interdiction soit levée. L'Obscuratoria est déclaré lorsqu'un temple est suspecté de corruption, avant un combat, ou en cas d'incident critique majeur... »
languages.original_text: "An Obscuratoria is a complete ban on holy ministry within the compound. Any and all sacred maintenance procedures are deferred until after the ban is lifted. An Obscuratoria is declared when a temple has been compromised by suspected corruption, before a battle, or in the event of a major critical incident..."

traits.locale_text: « Le mode Obscuratoria bannit tout membre du ministère sacré dans l'enceinte du complexe. Les procédures de maintenance sacrées sont alors reportées jusqu'à ce que l'interdiction soit levée. L'Obscuratoria est déclaré lorsqu'un temple est suspecté de corruption, avant un combat, ou en cas d'incident critique majeur... »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Una obscuratoria es una prohibición total de cualquier actividad sagrada en el recinto. Todos los procedimientos de mantenimiento se posponen hasta que se levante el veto. Se declara una obscuratoria cuando se sospecha que un templo se ha corrompido, antes de una batalla o si se produce un incidente crítico...».
languages.original_text: "An Obscuratoria is a complete ban on holy ministry within the compound. Any and all sacred maintenance procedures are deferred until after the ban is lifted. An Obscuratoria is declared when a temple has been compromised by suspected corruption, before a battle, or in the event of a major critical incident..."

traits.locale_text: «Una obscuratoria es una prohibición total de cualquier actividad sagrada en el recinto. Todos los procedimientos de mantenimiento se posponen hasta que se levante el veto. Se declara una obscuratoria cuando se sospecha que un templo se ha corrompido, antes de una batalla o si se produce un accidente crítico...».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Eine Obscuratoria ist ein vollständiges Verbot heiliger Aktivitäten innerhalb der Anlage. Sämtliche heiligen Wartungsprozeduren werden aufgeschoben, bis das Verbot wieder aufgehoben ist. Eine Obscuratoria wird verhängt, wenn ein Tempel möglicherweise durch Verderbtheit kompromittiert wurde, oder vor einer Schlacht oder im Falle eines kritischen Zwischenfalls ..."
languages.original_text: "An Obscuratoria is a complete ban on holy ministry within the compound. Any and all sacred maintenance procedures are deferred until after the ban is lifted. An Obscuratoria is declared when a temple has been compromised by suspected corruption, before a battle, or in the event of a major critical incident..."

traits.locale_text: "Eine Obscuratoria ist ein vollständiges Verbot heiliger Aktivitäten innerhalb der Anlage. Sämtliche heiligen Wartungsprozeduren werden aufgeschoben, bis das Verbot wieder aufgehoben ist. Eine Obscuratoria wird verhängt, wenn ein Tempel möglicherweise durch Verderbtheit kompromittiert wurde, oder vor einer Schlacht oder im Falle eines kritischen Unfalls ..."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Karartılım, kutsal ruhbanlığın bölüme girişinin tamamen yasaklanmasıdır. Yasak kaldırılana kadar tüm kutsal bakım prosedürleri ertelenir. Karartılım; tapınaklar yozlaşma şüphesiyle faaliyet dışı bırakıldığında, muharebe öncesinde veya büyük çaplı, kritik bir olay durumunda ilan edilir."
languages.original_text: "An Obscuratoria is a complete ban on holy ministry within the compound. Any and all sacred maintenance procedures are deferred until after the ban is lifted. An Obscuratoria is declared when a temple has been compromised by suspected corruption, before a battle, or in the event of a major critical incident..."

traits.locale_text: "Karartılım, kutsal ruhbanlığın bölüme girişinin tamamen yasaklanmasıdır. Yasak kaldırılana kadar tüm kutsal bakım prosedürleri ertelenir. Karartılım, bir tapınak yozlaşma şüphesiyle faaliyet dışı bırakıldığında, bir muharebe öncesinde veya büyük çaplı, kritik bir olay durumunda ilan edilir."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
